description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in IBM Maximo Asset Management 7.1, Maximo Asset Management Essentials 7.1, Tivoli Asset Management for IT 7.1 and 7.2, Tivoli Service Request Manager 7.1 and 7.2, and Change and Configuration Management Database (CCMDB) 7.1 and 7.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to a hidden frame footer.
